tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am diabetic, initial plan given was to have 3 sittings for my root canal.

They chose to do It over 4 sittings and one additional visit( when I had gum pain)

Additional sitting and care was given and longer gaps for pain to subside and gums to heal.

They went above and beyond my expectations

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Patient friendly service in all aspects 
Highly satisfied  
On time service
Excellent service room
Excellent staff
Pleasant environment

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
1)Assistants who took dental x ray were very inexperienced and not properly trained. They struggled with the task and repeated the process thereby subjecting me to unnecessary exposure to harmful X rays
2)  Though I told the Dr that I did scaling for my teeth only a month back, without explaining or informing properly, they did scaling again and charged me rs. 1500/_   If one more scaling was required, it should have been properly explained and my consent taken. 
3)while the particulars of a new patient are obtained in a form,  as soon as a new patient walks in., they want the patients to sign in a consent form, agreeing to all procedures etc., even before the patient meets the Dr. What is the need to sign a consent form even before patient meets the Dr and knows what exactly is to be done,?
reply_text:
For the record this is an old patient of ours who underwent root canal treatment around 2010 she underwent oral prophylaxis a month ago in Bangalore she reported for a complaint of sensitivity of teeth and pain in the upper left back region for which an orthopantogram was taken and oral prophylaxis was advised for localised periodontitis in 26,27 region with generalised gingivitis as it had not been done completely the last visit with another dentist in Bangalore 
1)For a consultation, orthopantogram Xray and oral prophylaxis  including polishing 1500 was charged. 
2)every practice is required to take patient consents for all procedures as per the law including consultations and nobody can be forced into any procedures without asking their consent which is what we follow 
3)The X-ray technician took only one digital X-ray in separate x ray room which is lead sheeted no repeat Xrays where done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very detailed effort to do a root canal treatment by Dr Sumeda and her team of highly efficient doctors and other helping staff..My family has been visiting  Dr Sumeda and Dr Nanda Kumar for the past 15 years and every time we visited them they have been upping their professional capabilities..Best of Luck...
reply_text: thank you Mr.Kumar for the trust in us !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am fully satisfied with the very friendly performace of the Chief Dr as well as the duty doctorin treating the patient, especially Sr. Citizens. The charges are also nominal when compared to the treatment given. I wish them all success.
reply_text: thank you for your great feedback we truly value your wishes

tags: None
review:
Felt like I was not given the proper service for the expensive prices they charged!

They are not even ready to give the paper consultation report which is so unprofessional! The doctor was saying they are not giving any more reports over paper but only through email! This is not the way, you treat a patient, Doctor! It's a patient's wish to have the reports over paper or email! What if a patient is not having email address but wants the report physically, will you tell him just create an email address right away so we will send the report? Strange!!

Taking x-rays in the office, took a lot of time, they have issues with their machines and take more time in taking teeth x-rays.

Overall, not a good experience visiting the place!
reply_text:
The patient reported has received all copies of the reports data prescription receipts physically was explained about all services before the
Procedures which included a consultation and orthopantogram followed by a routine oral prophylaxis after which we answered all her queries for about half an hour a copy of all reports was also emailed to her and shared through Practo online 
We have a fair share of  patients who want their findings on paper due to various reasons which we are ready to provide on a case to case basis as our endeavour is to be paperless unless for insurance purposes or claims where the companies want all the paperwork in physical format and all the data records can be accessed by patients through Practo 
Being a busy practice patients get delayed in between X-rays ,treatment  as we believe in high quality standards of care ,cleanliness

reply_text: I think we where in lockdown and not working since two months so I am surprised by this post which has happened a month ago but I guess nothing can be done as wearing a PPE suit with all accessories for every patient is a cost which is unavoidable thanks to covid ! Good standard of dentistry with a clean environment comes with a great cost which cannot be compromised at the alter of cost ! Patients and doctors lives matter !

tags: Value for money,
review: The doctor just removed the decayed tooth for my mum. It’s a full tooth and not a broken one. Just for removing a decayed tooth we paid Rs.2000 which is very very very costly. Though we asked the price for removing the tooth many times, the receptionist said they will tell after checking the tooth but was told only after removing it. This dental clinic is not affordable for middle class people.
